The purpose of the hunt is: the All-Seeing Eye, the Immortal Spirit, the Bloody Crimson, the Clifer, the Cyrona, the Valley Master, Stone Vanul, the Prophet, Night Cyrona, Demon Warrior, Flying Death, Guardian Spirit, Dimon, Dolores, Doll, Tor Scorpio. It is necessary to get a Piece of Pirate Meat - 150 pieces.
